name: Cordless 1/2 inch Brushless Impact Wrench, Max Torque (1000N.m) 740Ft-lbs Electric Impact Gun w/2x 4000mAh Battery, Charger & 6 Sockets, Power Impact Driver for Car Home
short_description: 1000N.m High Torque for Heavy Duty: The 21V brushless motor delivers 740Ft-lbs (1000N.m) of powerful torque, which is enough for most jobs. Bigger motor with stronger torque, more heavy-duty and more professional package. Suitable for unloading car tires, car repairs, building steel structures, scaffolding, DIY carpenters, home maintenance, workshops (When using, please keep away from the elderly and children to prevent accidental injury)

High-Efficiency Brushless Motor: Our 1/2 inch impact gun is equipped with high quality brushless motor. Compared with brushed motors, brushless motors do not generate sparks or smoke during operation, and their service life is 1.66 times longer than that of brushed motors. Brushless motors are the best choice for professionals

2PCS 4.0Ah Batteries & Dual Protection Function: With our 4.0Ah large-capacity battery, you will no longer have remaining power anxiety. At the same time, we are equipped with a fast charger, 4.0Ah battery lasts twice as long as 2.0Ah. Geting more efficiency out of your work.In reverse mode, once the nut or bolt is loosened, the brake stop device will start and reduce the speed and torque to protect the nut from flying, and the motor will open the automatic protection function

Three Speed & Two Direction: You can adjust the button in the middle of the product to adjust the direction of rotation of the wrench. At same time our power impact wrench has 3 speed modes to be choosen(0-1500/0-2600/0-3300Rpm) in POSTIVE MODE, and control the speed by switch trigger, which can make your work more precise

Rich Accessories to Meet Various Needs: The impact wrench with built-in LED which make your work in the dark easier. Accessories are neatly stored in the box, you will get 1*impact wrench, 2* 4.0AH batteries, 1*fast Charger, 6*1/2 impact socket set(14mm-17mm-18mm-19mm-21mm-22mm)

Excellent After-Sales Services: At Takuoo, we are committed to delivering high quality tools. That's why we offer a 3-year after-sales services on our products. If you are not satisfied for any reason, please don't hesitate to contact us. Takuoo battery powered impact gun is the perfect surprise for occasions like Father's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, Birthdays, Anniversaries, Valentine's Day and more

name: Cordless Impact Wrench 1/2 inch for Dewalt 20V Battery, 1000FT-LBS 1360N.m Brushless Electric Impact Gun 2300RPM High Torque Impact Driver with LED Work Light and Blet Clip (Battery NOT included)
short_description: Impact Wrench for Dewalt: B.ZSSY 1/2 inch cordless impact wrench compatible with Dewalt 20v batteries (battery not included), including DCB201 DCB203 DCB204 DCB205 DCB206 and more; Warm Tip: For optimal performance, a 4AH or higher battery is recommended; Note that this impact wrench driver is not rated for trucks or heavy-duty vehicles' lug nuts

1000FT-LBS Strong Torque Output​: 1/2 inch Cordless Impact Wrench has a powerful 950ft-lbs (1290N.m) tightening torque and 1000ft-lbs (1360N.m) loosening torque; To easily handle various high intensity bolt tightening and loosening tasks; Whether it's the stubborn bolts,including auto repair, machinery manufacturing, construction and industrial equipment maintenance; From professional workplaces to DIY projects in a home garage, it can be a great tool assistant, meeting the needs of different users in various scenarios

High Strength Alloy Steel Body​: Cordless Impact Wrench made of aluminum alloy with excellent heat dissipation, can quickly dissipate the heat generated during high speed motor operation; With sturdy case design, Excellent compression resistance and wear resistance; Even under high intensity and long-term working conditions, the body can maintain a stable structure, effectively preventing deformation and damage, prolonging its lifespan

Efficient Variable Speed and Control: Impact wrench brushless motors use field-weakening control technology, can provide appropriate power output according to different work requirements and control with 0-2300 RPM 4 speed mode settings, preventing potential safety hazards or work quality problems caused by excessive or insufficient torque; The overall efficiency can reach 85%-95%; Compared with traditional manual tools, it greatly shortens the working time and reduces the physical exertion of the operator

Versatility 1360N.m Impact Wrench: 1000Ft-lbs Cordless Impact Wrench with universal 1/2" hog ring, also functions as an impact driller and screwdriver; Equipped with impact wrench shoulder strap and belt clip, When working at heights and fatigue-related work, wrenches can drop, leading to preventable safety incidents, to better free labor hands

LED Work Light: Wrench with built-in great illumination LED light which dark or tight work areas, Enhance operational visibility and accuracy; No need to carry an additional flashlight or external lighting equipment, reducing the burden of carrying tools; Ideal for both professional and DIY tasks

name: Cordless Impact Wrench 1107Ft-lbs(1500N·m) - 1/2" 21V High Torque Brushless Power Impact Gun with 2x4.0Ah Batteries & 6 Sockets & Fast Charger & Case for Car & Truck & RV & Heavy Duty Use
short_description: Brushless Motor : SundpeyPRO half inch impact wrench is built with a brushless motor, noise is reduced by 50%. a long service life, stability performance more powerful. It can reach speeds of up to 2800 rpm and has a high torque of 1107 Ft-lbs/1500 N·m. compared with traditional brushless motor, impact gun runing time 55%, longer and is quieter, more efficient and easier to use. it is a true work beast, I believe electric impact gun will become an invaluable addition to your tool kit

2 × 4000mAh batteries: Which address the biggest Issue with cordless impact wrenches: battery life. A single battery takes only two hours to fully charge and provides an unloaded operating time of 45 minutes, the LED power indicator ensures perfect battery management, Our battery has an 60A overload protection function. When the current exceeds this value, the protection device will cut off the power supply to prevent damage to the motor and battery due to overload, making your work more reassuring

3 SPEED MODES ADJUSTABLE & TWO WAY MODE: SundpeyPRO battery impact gun has both forward and reverse mode.forward mode allows you to tighten bolts and reverse mode allows you to remove nuts or bolts. SundpeyPRO brushless electric impact wrench, low speed (400-800 rpm), medium speed (1100-1800 rpm), high speed (2100-2800 rpm), for stubborn nuts - Widely used in private cars, trucks, tractor tire removal/repair, agricultural machinery, large-scale construction and maintenance, furniture assembly, DIY projects, etc. to meet your daily needs, and completing jobs faster

With Reverse Auto Stop Mode: Our cordless impact wrenches have a reverse auto stop feature. the feature is activated by pressing the "Mode" switch on the gear display. once the nut or bolt is loosened, pulling the speed trigger will activate the brake stop, reducing speed and torque and preventing the nut from flying out. press the "Mode" switch again to turn RSS Mode Off

Equipped With 2 LED Lights & Anti Slip Handle: Increase the luminosity by 30%, helping you easily complete various tasks in extremely dark or narrow environments. the brushless impact wrench handle is an ergonomically designed anti slip rubber grip, providing you with a comfortable grip and reducing fatigue during use

Impact Gun Wrench Kit: This Kit Includes 1/2 Inch Electric Impact Gun, 2 x 4.0Ah Battery Packs, 1 x Fast Charger, 6 x Impact Socket Sets(7/8"(22mm) , 13/16"(21mm) , 3/4"(19mm) , 11/16"(17mm) , 9/16"(14mm) , 15/32"(12mm)), 2 x Pins, 2 x O-rings, 1 x User Manual and 1 x Sturdy Carrying Case, It is convenient to store the products and they won't be randomly placed everywhere. when in use, you still need to look for them.

Warm Tips : When receive our impact wrench 1/2 inch , first fully charge the battery to activate it. when the power impact gun is operated under load for a long time, the motor may become hot, which is normal. please do not worry. when the overload protection function is turned on, the battery may stop working. simply take down the battery, let it rest for a while, and then reinstall it to start working. when not using it, turn the switch to the locked state
Tip:We provides 365 days of product service, to ensure your shopping journey. If you have any problems, please tell us, we will solve your problems at the first time

name: DEWALT DCF913B 20V MAX* 3/8 in. Cordless Impact Wrench with Hog Ring Anvil (Tool Only)
short_description: VERSATILE FASTENING RANGE: Up to 250 ft-lbs of tightening torque and 400 ft-lbs of breakaway torque
ACCESS HARD-TO-REACH WORKSPACES with its compact size
QUICKLY CHANGE BITS: Hog ring anvil for rapid, secure socket changes
BRIGHTEN DARK WORK AREAS with on-board LED ring
product_description: The versatile 20V MAX* 3/8 in. Cordless Impact Wrench with Hog Ring Anvil was engineered to handle multiple applications. Fasten or loosen bolts and lug nuts with up to 250 ft-lbs of max tightening torque and 400 ft-lbs of max breakaway torque. Its compact size was designed for maneuvering in tight spots. Illuminate low-light work areas with the built-in LED ring for visibility in dimly lit workspaces. Battery not included.

name: SEYVUM Impact Wrench,1/2" Impact Gun, Power Impact Driver Max Torque 320 Ft-lbs (430N.m), Cordless Impact Wrench with 20V Brushless Motor, 4.0Ah Li-ion Battery with Fast Charger, 4 Pcs Impact Sockets
short_description: Buy It with Confidence: SEYVUM offers strong technical support and replacement assurance, and any questions will be answered; With the SEYVUM Power Impact Wrench, you can confidently tackle even the toughest jobs without worrying about the lack of power

Powerful Motor & High Strength Anvil: The SEYVUM Power Impact Wrench features a compact motor design that takes up 33% less space, providing better thermal efficiency and up to 320 ft-lbs (430N.m) of torque and 3000 RPM; The brushless motor runs more safely without sparks, allowing you to easily and quickly tighten or loosen various nuts and bolts

Variable Speed & Mode Switch: The infinitely variable speed control is possible with the trigger, and the further you push the trigger, the faster the anvil of the wrench spins; You can also use the mode switch button to switch RPM from 1400 to 3000 and IPM 1980 to 2900

LED Light & Brake Stop: The built-in LED light of this impact gun enhances visibility in dark working areas, and the reversing self-stop function ensures that the nut will not fall off easily when you remove it. Simply press and hold the trigger when you turn on this function, and the square driver will turn a few turns and then stop automatically

4.0 AH Battery & Fast Charger: The package includes a rechargeable 20V 4.0 Ah lithium-ion battery, providing a longer usage time for this impact gun; The power indicator reminds you of the remaining battery power, and the included fast charger can fully charge the battery in just 2 hours
Product Content: The package of this electric wrench included 1x 4.0Ah battery, 4x sockets(17mm,19mm,20mm,21mm), 1x carrying bag, and 1x fast charger

name: Milwaukee 2962-20 M18 18V Fuel 1/2" Mid-torque Impact Wrench with Friction Ring
short_description: Friction ring (hog ring) ensures quick and easy socket changes
Tri-LEDs deliver high definition lighting to increase workspace visibility with less shadows
Auto shut-off control applies no more than 35 ft. lbs. of torque for hand-tight fastening applications to prevent overtightening
Bolt removal control delivers full torque output, then decreases RPMs once the bolt is loosened to prevent fastener drops
product_description: M18 FUEL Gen-2 18-Volt Lithium-Ion Brushless Cordless Mid Torque 1/2 in. Impact Wrench w/Friction Ring (Tool-Only)

name: 1/2" Cordless Impact Wrench 1600Nm(1200Ft-lbs) High Torque Brushless Impact Gun with 2 x 4.0Ah Batteries, 6 Sockets, Charger, Extension Bar, Variable Speeds for Home/Car/Truck/RV/Mower
short_description: 【Powerful Brushless Motor & Smart Speed Control】GEARLASSO Cordless Impact Wrench experience 1,600 Nm (1,200 Ft-lbs) of max torque with our ultra-efficient brushless motor. Features 3-speed modes (0-900/1,200/1,800 RPM) in forward mode for precision tasks. 2 oparation modes (break stop or not) in reverse mode. Runs 60% longer, quieter, and spark free vs. traditional motors ideal for heavy-duty jobs.

【Versatile Applications + Safety Note】This impact wrench tackle rusted bolts, tire changes, furniture assembly, and more on cars, trucks, RVs, mowers, and tractors. (Note: Not recommended for semi-trailers/large industrial trucks).

【2x 4.0Ah Batteries & Rapid Charging】Cordless wrench kit includes dual 21V 4.0Ah lithium-ion batteries for extended runtime (70% longer than standard packs). The fast charger refills batteries in 1-2 hours, minimizing downtime. Perfect for back-to-back projects.

【Built-in LED Light & Compact Design】Work confidently in dark spaces! The 1/2" brushless impact wrench features a bright LED light to illuminate tight spots (e.g., car wheels, machinery), ensuring accuracy for pros and DIYers alike.

【Full Electric Cordless Wrench Kit】The electric impact wrench kit includes: 1 x Impact Wrench, 2 x 4.0Ah Batteries, 1 x Desktop Rapid Charger, 6 x Sockets (14mm / 17mm / 18mm / 19mm / 21mm / 22mm), 1 x Extension Bar (5 inches), 1× Sturdy Suitcase.

【Guarantee Service】GEARLASSO provide up to 365 days warranty 24/7 expert support, If there are any problems with the product during the after-sales period, there is no need to return it. Please contact us to provide you with free parts or new products.

name: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Impact Wrench, 1/2 Impact Gun, High Torque with Hog Ring Anvil, Tool Only (DCF900B)
short_description: COMPLETE A WIDE VARIETY OF FASTENING APPLICATIONS with 1030 ft-lbs of max fastening torque and 1400 ft-lbs of max breakaway torque
INCREASE USER CONTROL IN A VARIETY OF APPLICATIONS with 4-mode speed settings and variable speed trigger
DEISGNED TO HELP PREVENT OVERTIGHTENING AND FASTENER RUN-OFF with Precision Wrench control
REDUCE WEAR AND TEAR ON THE BATTERY WHILE YOU WORK with BATTERYGUARD - a shock-absorbing battery-to-tool connection (battery sold separately)
ILLUMINATE DARK WORKSPACES using the on-tool LED work light
product_description: Complete the toughest jobs utilizing the power of the DEWALT 20V MAX* XR 1/2 in. High Torque Impact Wrench. Delivering 1030 ft-lbs. of max fastening torque and 1400 ft-lbs. of max breakaway torque, making it ideal for large sized pipe flanges, grooved couplings, wheel lugs, concrete anchor bolt setting and many other heavy-duty impact wrench applications. The PRECISION WRENCH mode is included to help prevent overtightening in forward, and run-off in reverse, for additional user control. Utilize the updated 4-mode push button switch to easily transition speeds and adjust LED brightness when needed. Battery and charger sold separately.
